briefTitle: Treatment of GVHD in Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplant (HSCT) Recipients Using AAT Plus Corticosteroids (CS) Compared With Corticosteroids Alone
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Multicenter Phase III Trial of Alpha 1 - Antitrypsin (AAT) Combined With Corticosteroids vs Corticosteroids Alone for the Treatment of High Risk Acute Graft-versus-Host Disease (GVHD) Following Allogeneic Hematopoietic Stem Cell Transplant
summary: Study CSL964\_5001 will investigate the efficacy of AAT with corticosteroids compared with corticosteroids alone as first line therapy for patients with high-risk acute GVHD

primaryOutcome.measure: Overall Response Rate (ORR) to Acute Graft-versus-Host Disease (GVHD) Treatment
